templates.template: item.baconSword.name=Legendary Bacon Sword of the Sells item.baconAxe.name=Bacon Axe item.baconHoe.name=Bacon Hoe item.baconPickaxe.name=Bacon Pickaxe item.baconShovel.name=Bacon Shovel (It isn't a spade!!)

private static final int baconToolHarvestLevel = 3; // what this tool can harvest (3 = diamond, 4 = obsidian) private static final int baconToolMaxUses = 1500; // how many times it can be used private static final float baconToolEfficiency = 10.0F; // efficiency of shovel and pickaxe private static final float baconToolDamage = 9.0F; // private static final int baconToolEnchantability = 15; // how many levels of enchantment can be added public static final ToolMaterial BaconToolMaterial = EnumHelper .addToolMaterial("BACON", baconToolHarvestLevel, baconToolMaxUses, baconToolEfficiency, baconToolDamage, baconToolEnchantability);
FMLCommonHandler.instance().bus().register(new PlayerTickHandler(Minecraft.getMinecraft()));
proxy.initialize();
// records public static ItemRecord BaconPancakesRecord = new BaconPancakesRecord();
item.baconPancakesRecord.name=Bacon Pancakes, Makin' Bacon Paancaaakes item.record.BaconPancakes.desc=Bacon Pancakes, Featuring Jake!
// records GameRegistry.registerItem(BaconPancakesRecord, "baconPancakesRecord");

[ { "modid": "thatconferencebacon", "name": "That Conference - Minecraft Modding with Bacon!", "description": "BACON!!", "version": "v0.0.1", "mcversion": "1.7.10", "updateUrl": "", "url": "https://github.com/pvanhouten/thatconference-baconmod", "authorList": ["pvanhouten"], "credits": "MinecraftWero for creating the bacon images", "parent": "", "screenshots": [], "dependencies": [] } ]
// food public static ItemFood RawBaconItem = new RawBacon(2, 10, true);
// food GameRegistry.registerItem(RawBaconItem, "rawBacon");
item.rawBacon.name=Raw Bacon
// recipes GameRegistry.addShapelessRecipe(new ItemStack(RawBaconItem, 4), new ItemStack(Items.porkchop)); // porkchops to 4x bacon
public static ItemFood CookedBaconItem = new CookedBacon(5, 30, true);
item.cookedBacon.name=Cooked Bacon
GameRegistry.registerItem(CookedBaconItem, "cookedBacon");
GameRegistry.addSmelting(RawBaconItem, new ItemStack(CookedBaconItem), 0);

item.baconHelmet.name=Legendary Bacon Helmet of the Ender item.baconPlate.name=Legendary Bacon Plate of the Squid item.baconLeggings.name=Legendary Bacon Leggings of the Nether item.baconBoots.name=Legendary Bacon Boots of the Scarlet Speedster

tile.baconBlock.name=Bacon Block
